institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 4 (Composition of Deliberation Committee)
contents: Article 4 (Composition of Deliberation Committee) ① The Corporation shall establish a Human Resources Development Deliberation Committee for each industry (hereinafter referred to as the *Deliberation Committee) with up to 20 members for ISC public offering and selection, confirmation of operation and business performance, and decision-making on important matters. ), and the chairperson is elected by the deliberation committee members. Revised December 31, 2019. ② The Deliberation Committee is composed of experts in vocational competency development, qualifications, NCS, human resource development, budget and accounting, officials from worker and employer organizations, government officials such as the Ministry of Employment and Labor, and Corporation officials, but external members deliberate. It shall be decided by a majority of the registered members of the committee. Revised December 31, 2019, ③ The term of office of the deliberation committee members shall be one year, but may be reappointed, and more than one-third of all members must be replaced within three years. However, the term of office of ex officio members shall be the term of office, and the term of office of newly appointed members due to the resignation of a member shall be the remaining term of office of the former member.
